main.name: Meenakshi Lodhi
main.description: I can sum up my entire personal and professional life in three words - I CAN WIN
main.bio: Myself Meenakshi. I belong to UP. And I have done my ğ˜½. ğ™ğ™˜. ğ˜¾ğ™¤ğ™¢ğ™¥ğ™ªğ™©ğ™šğ™§ ğ™ğ™˜ğ™ğ™šğ™£ğ™˜ğ™š Throughout my academic career, I have consistently performed with the highest aggregate percentage and received an alumni award. In addition to my studies, I have participated in various sports activities and have won several gold medals in competitions. I also represented my college in the LIC & Hindustan Olympiad in 2019 and was titled the District Topper of that year.I have completed a workshop on cyber security conducted by the RBI and central government, and am currently working as a Teaching Assistant and Trainee at a Bootcamp for backend development using Node JS, Express JS, and MongoDB. I am also familiar with AWS S3, Redis, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have completed five major projects in Node JS and MongoDB, including an e-commerce website, book management system, blogging site, URL shortener, and college internship portal. I have also learned about data structures and algorithms and have solved many questions on platforms such as Leetcode and Codezinger.My goal is to work with a reputed company to have a successful career and bright future where I can not only earn well but also learn well. I am passionate about technology and am excited about the potential for innovation and growth. I believe that I have the skills necessary to succeed in a tech job, such as problem-solving, coding, and communication.I am a self-motivated, hard-working, and disciplined individual with strong communication and problem-solving skills. My greatest strength is my creativity, as I always strive to approach problems in new ways and think outside the box. I am confident that I can make a valuable contribution to your company and believe that my skills and project experience make me a strong fit for this role in backend development. Thank you for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to your response.

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, JsonWebToken
work.description: We have successfully completed our project, Blogging Site, with my teammates  Ishaan Mangal, Atul Yadav and Subhajeet Banerjee.This is a group project where we had to create API's for resgistering a user as a Author login of user with JWT Token for authentication purpose and has has worked on authorization for creating blogs, getting list of blogs, updation and deletion of the blogs.

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript

In this project we basically managed the students who want to apply for the interns in a particular college. There we introduced 3 #apis and have done the authentication, validations using different functions which was executed by mongodb and nodejs .
